required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Optimal Timing of BR55 CEUS of the Ovaries
clinical_study.official_title: An Exploratory Study to Determine the Optimal Timing of BR55 Contrast Enhanced Ultrasound (CEUS) of the Ovaries in Pre-menopausal Women

brief_summary.textblock: This is an exploratory, single center, open label, prospective study of BR55 to determine the optimal phase of the menstrual cycle for performing BR55 CEUS of the target ovary in premenopausal women scheduled to undergo preventative surgery because of high familial/hereditary or genetic risk for ovarian cancer.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Group A: BR55 CEUS will be performed in the early follicular phase first and in the late follicular phase thereafter; Group B: BR55 CEUS will be performed in the late follicular phase first and in the early phase thereafter.

primary_outcome.description: BR55-enhanced images will be visually assessed using a 3-point scale (no enhancement, weak enhancement, strong enhancement).

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the time of signing Informed Consent through 24 hrs post dose follow up evaluation
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants who received the contrast agent and experienced an adverse event.

arm_group.description: BR55 will be performed in the early follicular phase first and in the late follicular phase thereafter.
BR55 will be performed in the late follicular phase first and in the early follicular phase thereafter.

intervention.description: BR55 will be administered at doses of 0.03 mL/kg or 0.05 mL/kg

eligibility.gender_description: Female subject of at least 18 years of age
